transcript.text:

buddy.
Or should I say,

Um...

by minute !
Today, what are we going to do?

we play games...

you sent me a lot of,
even mails or even in feedbacks

you like it

We're still here to make bad puns, unh?

Um...

In fact, I have really really so much fun to do videos

Being alone all the time is a bit sad,
in what we love to do !
Moreover, it's why now I own a studio
Like you could have seen it !

And why that ?
Because, I would become mad if I went any longer to stay home
all the day !
When I was working,
when I wasn't
and when I was playing !
I was always between the same walls !
And I practically gone mad !
But now, I woke up the morning like everyone,
at 11 o'clock !
Ah, being a youtuber it's like being a jobless personn !
And I don't see it like unpleasant at all,
per contra,
it is really cool to wake up and move from home,
but to go in a place that's you love as much as home
To do something you love !
In brief, it's great ! I am definitely estatic since I got this little studio
I mean, "little", it is quite big
I'm lucky !
Thus, what I was saying ?
Ah yes :  why were you finding the videos better ?

people can see it !
And there's less pleasure, people can see it too
And I certainly will take less pleasure in some videos than others
obviously !
And, second thing, it's the fucking feedbacks :
oh since there is a moderation team which work perfectly
it's fantastic !
I take a lot a pleasure to read feedbacks
I really feel to make videos
and that there is people who watch it, and not doing it for nothing

- and it makes a lot of people !
this number is astronomical ! -
It's unbelievable but you don't realize
yet, when people write you things
you do realize !
And thus, since I read again your feedbacks,
and I see your sentences, your funny things, your raves, your news,
it makes me really happy !
So yeah, I wanted to thank you for the feedbacks who becames once again
awesome !

because...

it's really beautiful...
